open.title: Open acceptance of applications
open.description: Companies will be able to apply for accreditation in the registry.

close.title: Close acceptance of applications
close.description: Acceptance of new applications will be terminated. Previously submitted applications are available for processing.

add_company.title: Add companies
add_company.sub_title: Add companies to expand the registry

attraction_channels.title: Attraction channels
attraction_channels.tooltip: To configure the registries widget, go to the public page section of the company profile. Find a widget and place it on your site

expiring_accreditations.title: Accreditation lost
expiring_accreditations.sub_title: Companies that have lost their accreditation in the registry

expire_soon.title: Expiring accreditations
expire_soon.sub_title: Accreditations before the expiration date of less than 30 days

settings.title: Description and parameters
settings.sub_title: Description and documents of the register, method and term of accreditation

questionnaire.title: Registry questionnaire
questionnaire.sub_title: Blocks of the questionnaire, scoring, access to the application

access.title: User access
access.sub_title: Access to the registry for user groups and their rights

errors.no_active_version: The register does not contain a valid profile
errors.no_active_formula: The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula
errors.no_deferred_formula: The questionnaire that comes into force does not contain a scoring formula

refuse.title: Automatic rejection of applications to the register
refuse.text: Reject orders with scoring less than {{value}}

ranking.title: Ranking of companies in the register

empty.title: Automate the registry
empty.subtitle: Use scoring to automatically reject applications and rank companies in the registry

automation_turn_off.title: Disable automation
automation_turn_off.text: Disable automatic rejection of applications and ranking of companies in the registry?

auto_reject.title: Automatic rejection of applications
auto_reject.checkbox: Enable automatic rejection of applications to the registry
auto_reject.min_scoring: Reject applications with a score of less than
auto_reject.info: The setting is applied to new orders and does not affect previously submitted orders.
auto_reject.info_turned_off:
Automatic rejection of applications to the registry is disabled.
Previously rejected applications will not be restored.

scoring.title: Ranking of companies in the register
scoring.checkbox: Enable ranking of companies in the registry by category

info.true:
Ranking by category applies to companies whose claims contain a scoring.
Recalculating categories may take some time.
info.false: Ranking of companies in the registry by category is disabled

error.title: Registry automation not available
error.no_active_version:
The register does not contain a valid profile.
Set up and deploy a scoring questionnaire to automate the registry.
error.no_active_formula:
The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula.
Set up and deploy a scoring questionnaire to automate the registry.
error.no_deferred_formula:
The questionnaire that comes into effect does not contain a scoring formula.
Set up a questionnaire scoring to automate the registry.

empty.title: There are no groups with access to the registry
empty.text: Give the groups access to the registry to adjust the Accreditation Commission.

list.title: Stages of the Commission's work
list.notice: During the stage, the groups work simultaneously. The veto blocks the decision on the company's accreditation and terminates the work of the commission ahead of schedule

popup.title: Groups
popup.empty: There are no groups to add

decision.title: Decision on the company's accreditation in the registry

new_version_dialog.title: Change questionnaire
new_version_dialog.description: Create a draft to change the questions, logic and scores in the new version of the questionnaire.
new_version_dialog.info: Access settings do not require creating a new version.

questionnaire_card.title: Registry questionnaire
questionnaire_card.info: Set up the questionnaire and provide access to view companies requests.
questionnaire_card.no_groups: Access to the block for groups is not granted

add_group_popover.no_groups_info: Set up access for groups included in the accreditation committee

scoring.title: Scoring company assessment
scoring.subtitle: Calculate the scoring score of the company's application based on the results of the survey.

delete_block.title: Delete block
delete_block.info:
It will be impossible to restore the block.
Check the correctness of the calculation of the scoring score after deleting the block.

group.title: Delete group
group.text: The group and the questions it contains will be deleted. Move the questions to another group to save them.

object.title: Delete question
object.text: Confirm the deletion of the question.

validation.category_name: Specify the names of the categories
validation.category_scoring_range: Fill in the scoring scale, the numbers follow in descending order.

questionnaire_block.empty_info: Create the first section of the questionnaire block

default.notice: Registry will be available to receive applications for accreditation.

Registry.ApprovalType.title: Method of inclusion in the registry

Questionnaire.Deferred.NotExists.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Deferred.NotExists.text: The register questionnaire has not been put into force. Рекомендуем ввести анкету в действие to obtain detailed information about the applicant company.

Questionnaire.Active.NotExists.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Active.NotExists.text: The registry doesn't contain a questionnaire. We recommend using the questionnaire to obtain detailed information about the applicant company.

Questionnaire.Active.NoScoring.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Active.NoScoring.text: The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula.

Questionnaire.Deferred.NoScoring.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Deferred.NoScoring.text: The questionnaire that comes into force does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula.

Commission.NotExists.title: Accreditation Commission
Commission.NotExists.text: The accreditation commission has not been set up to consider applications for inclusion in the registry.  Set up an accreditation commission or change method of inclusion in the registry.

Questionnaire.Active.NotExists.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Active.NotExists.text: The registry doesn't contain a questionnaire. The accreditation commission examines the applicant's questionnaire when making a decision on accreditation.

Questionnaire.Active.NoScoring.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Active.NoScoring.text: The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula.

Questionnaire.Deferred.NoScoring.title: Questionnaire
Questionnaire.Deferred.NoScoring.text: The questionnaire that comes into force does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula.

activate.title: Launch questionnaire
activate.from_date_snack: The questionnaire will come into force on the specified date

errors.common_error: The questionnaire block "{{value}}" contains configuration errors.
errors.formula_variable_not_found: The variable "{{value}}" was not found to calculate the scoring. Update the scoring formula.
errors.empty: The registry questionnaire is not configured. Set up a questionnaire to receive advanced information about the applicant company.
errors.blocks_empty: The register questionnaire block "{{value}}" does not contain any questions. Customize the profile or delete the block.
errors.no_scoring: The questionnaire does not contain a scoring formula. Set up the scoring formula and put the questionnaire into action.

activate.fix_error: Correct any errors and retry the action.

delete_draft.title: Delete draft
delete_draft.text: It will be impossible to restore the draft of the questionnaire.

cancel_deferred.title: Cancel activation
cancel_deferred.text: The questionnaire will be transferred to the “Draft” status.

import_questionnaire.title: Upload questionnaire from file
import_questionnaire.text: Previously created sections and questions will be deleted.
import_questionnaire.success: The questionnaire from the file is loaded

errors.version: File "{{ file }}" contains an obsolete format. Use a new format. To do this, export the Questionnaire again and re-upload.
errors.format: File "{{ file }}" does not contain a Questionnaire. Choose another file or export the Questionnaire again and re-upload.
errors.parsing: File "{{ file }}" is damaged. Export the Questionnaire again and re-upload.
errors.default: An error has occurred. Please try again or try again later. If the problem persists, contact technical support.
